name: Industrial Exhibition in Malmö
obverse: Bust of Oscar II facing right. Triangles surround the edge of the obverse.
obverse_inscriptions: OSCAR II SVERIGES OCH NORGES KONUNG
reverse: A woman in an antique robe facing right. She is holding a gear in her left hand and bundle of grain in the left. Behind her are various industrial items and the Swedish coat of arms. Triangles surround the edge of the revierse.
reverse_inscriptions: INDUSTRI OCH SLÖJDUTSTÄLLNINGEN I MALMÖ ÅR 1881
description: This medal commemorates the industrial exhibition held in Malmö, Sweden in 1881.
